categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you need somewhere to work and/or relax with friendly staff, plenty of seating, free wifi - go to a library!
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Youâ€™re under no obligation to buy anything to sit there.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Dreading something? Avoidance makes it 100x harder because it completely disempowers you.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: When the only way out is through, turn and face the discomfort, take a deep breath and walk towards it.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you're ever not sure what to do, clean. When you figure it what you should be doing, you'll have a clear work space.

categoryContent.paragraphTwo: It's one of the most under-appreciated tools within any productivity environment and rarely used to its full potential.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: When your mental health isn't in the best state, give yourself a break.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Don't feel guilty for things you can't do. Normal things like eating, sleeping or socialising may be difficult, it's okay to struggle.
categoryContent.paragraphThree: Rest, recover, be kind to yourself and know the bad times are temporary.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Whatever the day, situation, or your mood, get up in the morning, take a shower, wear fresh clothes and get ready for the day, even if you don't have any plans or work.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: You're more likely to feel good and be in a better mood all day and send good vibes to others around you.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Your hobbies are your hobbies for a reason, let it be a thing a of comfort, and not a chore or a burden.
Go for a walk every day.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: While this sounds ineffective, it actually proves helpful to making yourself more productive and happy - and is very effective at doing so.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Don't put your life on hold waiting for closure on something you're struggling with.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Many of life's most difficult situations don't have reasonable explanations.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Stay away from the no sleep/hustler lifestyle. It creates unsustainable expectations, encourages an unhealthy lifestyle and promotes burnout. You'll simply work yourself into exhaustion.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: Instead, learn to use your time wisely and enforce reasonable boundaries.
